root: ^Gentle footsteps approach the door, then halt.
^She can see you through the door's peephole.
^Don't you remember what I told you? I'm not playing your stupid games anymore
^*scoff* So you were wasted then too? Figures.
^No Julia, I don't remember anything! I don't remember you and I barely remember who I am.
^Oh would you please cut the crap! First it was the screaming on the phone and now you have amnesia!?
^I'm serious! I was just checked out of the Hospital two days ago I can prove it. Please Just let me in. I need to know what happened the night before.
^*sigh*, Fine, get in here. I'm getting tired of shouting through the door.
^Yes. Doc says I fell and hit my head.
^Barely anything. I know my name is Nicholas, I know we had some kind of relationship, but it didn't work out.
^That is one way to put it, yes.

c-1: ^ I don't know what was happening the night I called you.
